# benchmark

A benchmark of [this code][task], run via the [\`dyno\`][dyno-module] module

## Usage

> run the benchmark

```bash
npm run benchmark
```

> start a mock server   
> for deploying on webserver providers, Heroku etc

```bash
npm start
```

[task]: ./task.js
[dyno-module]: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nicholaswmin/dyno
